template: Generate one single-sentence plain-English prompt describing a realistic software engineering task in {technical_domain} that includes defining requirements, building components, testing, fixing issues, and deploying to an environment; output only the prompt text under 45 words.
filled_prompt: Generate one single-sentence plain-English prompt describing a realistic software engineering task in ML pipeline that includes defining requirements, building components, testing, fixing issues, and deploying to an environment; output only the prompt text under 45 words.

message.content: Design and implement a model monitoring system that alerts on data drift, requiring you to write the detection logic, validate it with unit tests, debug false positives, and deploy it to the staging environment.
message.reasoning_content:
Okay, the user wants a single-sentence prompt describing a realistic ML pipeline task. Let me break down their requirements. They mentioned including defining requirements, building components, testing, fixing issues, and deploying. Also, it has to be under 45 words and in plain English.

First, I need to make sure all elements are covered in one smooth sentence. Maybe start with the overall goal, then list the steps naturally. How about something like: "Design and implement a model monitoring system that alerts on data drift, requiring you to write the detection logic, validate it with unit tests, debug false positives, and deploy it to the staging environment."

Let me check the word count. Yes, that’s under 45. It includes requirements (designing the system), building (writing detection logic), testing (unit tests), fixing (debugging false positives), and deploying. Sounds realistic for an ML engineer’s daily task. Should be good to go.
